main event: Observation of two light spots in the sky reported by observer V.A. on June 25, 1958 in Alexandria, Louisiana.
interesting points: The objects were described as two light spots about the size of a dime side by side., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes., The report is linked to Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program investigating UFOs., Historical context includes a series of UFO reports from state troopers in the area, including a possible NICAP bulletin., The objects emitted very bright light and were observed visually without radar confirmation.
sighted object: two light spots in the sky
